I eat my feelings.

summer is my favorite season.

content.text: Hello there! Where are you from?
Greetings! I am from the suburbs of Chicago, Illinois. Where are you from?
I live in rural Wisconsin. It's a bit quiet around here, but I like it.
I can imagine! I like quiet places. I enjoy going to the beach to relax and spend time with my family.
I went to the beach a few months ago. It was really nice to get away from the hustle and bustle of city life.
I'm glad you enjoyed it! It's so relaxing to be by the water.
I agree. What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy learning to play the piano. I've been taking lessons for a few months now, and I'm really enjoying it.
That's awesome! I used to play the piano when I was younger, but I haven't played in a long time.
You should pick it up again! It's really fun to play.
Maybe I will. What else do you like to do?
I also enjoy wearing suits that make a statement. I like to dress up and feel confident.
I like that! I like to wear comfortable clothes, but I can appreciate a good suit.
I'm glad to hear that. We should get together sometime and have a piano jam session.
That would be fun! I'll bring the snacks.
